total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grid. The pattern seems to be a sequence of numbers from 1 to 9, repeating three times in each row, with some numbers replaced by 0s.
Q2: Determine the rule for replacing numbers with 0s. It appears that a block of numbers in the sequence is replaced with 0s, and the size and position of this block varies in each row.
Q3: Apply the identified pattern and rule to the quiz input grid. Replace the 0s with the correct numbers in the sequence.
Q4: Verify that the output grid matches the expected pattern and sequence.
Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grid. The pattern seems to be a sequence of numbers from 1 to 9, repeating three times in each row, with some numbers replaced by 0s.
Q2: Determine the position of the 0s in each row of the input grid.
Q3: Identify the pattern of the 0s. The 0s seem to be replacing a sequence of numbers in the middle of each row.
Q4: Determine the sequence of numbers that the 0s are replacing.
Q5: Replace the 0s with the correct sequence of numbers to match the pattern in the rest of the row.
